topics.body:
Playing catch-up since I was asleep/out all day

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ff100663687242260d0800#post_54ff100663687242260d0800
[bq="HJSDGCE"]Guys, I know this is a bit late but a few hours ago, I found a young kitten in the mailbox. Usually, I would just leave it alone but after a while, its mother didn't return so I took it in.

So, how do I take care of it? From the looks of it, I'd say it's a week old.[/bq]
GIVE IT A SCARF THAT CAN MAKE IT SPEAK

YOU ARE TURNING INTO THE ANIMES
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/576/413/22e.gif!
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ff5d3963687234206b0500#post_54ff5d3963687234206b0500

[bq="trashboat"]Mr. Enter released an admirable animation on Rick and Morty. (And I'm now interested in checking it out.)[/bq]
It looks ok, the animation style is still weird to me but I think I could get used to it
